price: Egya no bεhye wͻn anim, ayi (wͻn) anofafa (afri hͻ) awene wͻn se wͻ (Ogya no) mu.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
